description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $528.4K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Johnson’s Construction. The average
  contract duration was 1.69 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $4.7M. The longest
  contract was 3.93 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $8.0M.
